<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 2"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Eerie Flicker](/Feats.aspx?ID=3788) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Gatewalkers</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Conjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=33" />
<trait label="Deviant" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=426" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gatewalkers Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=190) pg. 11, [Dark Archive](/Sources.aspx?ID=129) pg. 102</row>

**Trigger**
A enemy's Strike would hit you and you weren't already [concealed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=4), [hidden](/Conditions.aspx?ID=22), or [undetected](/Conditions.aspx?ID=39) by that enemy.

</column>

---

Your body flickers momentarily into the [Ethereal Plane](/Planes.aspx?ID=9). You become concealed for 1 round, and the flat check for concealment applies to the Strike that would have hit you. If the flat check fails, the Strike misses you.
name: Eerie Flicker
